reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2020
reviews.name: Michael Hood
reviews.title: Awesome Price to performance
reviews.review: Awesome CPU. Well worth the money. Absolutely no downfalls as of yet. Can't beat the price to performance.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2020
reviews.name: William
reviews.title: Good CPU
reviews.review: First pc build and the 3600x is a good deal for gaming and/or streaming/editing

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2020
reviews.name: Ryan L
reviews.title: It’s great for me.
reviews.review: It’s great the little bit bigger cooler helps also it’s a huge upgrade for me. I would recommend it to anyone who wants the beast amount of performance for the price.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020
reviews.name: Andrew Cervantes
reviews.title: Perfect, Powerful, Worth It
reviews.review: Very worth the cost, one of the best CPU's i've used on a budget.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2020
reviews.name: Jon Mojica
reviews.title: Awesome with A520
reviews.review: Paired this with an A520 board for a budget build. Works amazing and hit rated clocks out of the box. Used 3200Mhz ram and this made for a smooth experience. Definitely recommend this combo to anyone looking for entry-level board and CPU combo

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.name: OR Park
reviews.title: Excellent CPU
reviews.review: I'm cooling this with a Noctua NH-U14S. This card performs perfectly for 1080p and 4k gaming. Really couldn't ask for a better value for the money.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.name: Zach Gardner
reviews.title: no problems
reviews.review: works perfectly. if you're buying this you've probably already researched your other options as well.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.name: Daniel Wilson
reviews.title: 3600x and 3600 are virtually identical except in price.
reviews.review: The 3600 was out of stock so had to pay more for the 3600x.I have one of each and side by side benchmarks are almost identical.Maybe a 1% increase with the 3600x.So save some money and get the 3600 without the X, you won't notice a difference.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020
reviews.name: M. Arias
reviews.title: Great upgrade!
reviews.review: I needed to update my processor as my son is into gaming.I read great reviews about AMD so I upgraded to an AMD Ryzen 3 3600X CPU from my old Intel i5-4690K. I found Gigabyte B550 AORUS Elite for the motherboard.Including a cooler is a huge plus!The cooler has thermal paste already on it so no need to have some unless you take the cooler off the CPU.Installing the CPU and RAM were easy. Just make sure the CPU arm is fully opened before inserting the processor.With the Ryzen 3 cooler, I did have to remove the cooler attachment that was already on the motherboard.I don't need to do any benchmarking because I know this is a huge improvement over my old Intel.For the price, this is a great processor.I was an Intel fan but AMD is beating Intel.

reviews.review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
reviews.name: apatheticzekrom
reviews.title: Return not correct
reviews.review: Says returnable until Jan 31st, not actually returnable. Restocking fee for 40$
